title: Mixed Phenomenological Approach for Designing Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Career-preparation course for job seekers aiming to strengthen social sector job competencies. Operated in smartphone-centric limited technological environments with formative assessment-centered learning support.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three ICT tool strategies to promote meaningful learning in remote education environments.
Learners can analyze curriculum design requirements by applying a mixed phenomenological research methodology.
Learners can design and implement interaction strategies suitable for small online learning groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
